overview.ovdesc:
DW DW.EXTRACT.PARAM DW.EXTRACT.PARAM
This application is used to define files from which records are to be extracted for external processing either when they are updated online or during the COB.

desc.p: This is the routine which holds rules engine and checks for any condition and gets back with a flag saying whether we are interested in that particular record update or not.
1.The routine should have an entry defined in EB.API 2. Input not allowed if the ID is ‘SYSTEM’
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Field to fill up meaning full description of the record
This Field enables the ETL Extraction Process. To trigger the Extraction Process, DW.EXTRACT.PARAM should contain a record – SYSTEM in which the field ENABLE should be set to YES.
: 1. Can be YES,NO or NULL 2. Input allowed if Key is SYSTEM
Identifies the file from which records are to be extracted or can be ‘SYSTEM’.
1. Can be ‘SYSTEM’ 2. If not ‘SYSTEM’ then it must be a valid T24 file name i.e. present on FILE.CONTROL.
